titles.title: Medical Expense Deduction Act
A bill to repeal the tax increase imposed by Obamacare on taxpayers who incur catastrophic medical expenses.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/20/2014--Introduced. Medical Expense Deduction Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from 10% to 7.5% of adjusted gross income the threshold after which medical expenses are fully deductible.
